tutorials.title: How to Create an External Catalog in Oracle AI Data Platform Workbench
tutorials.description: This LiveLabs Sprint walks you through the steps to create an external catalog in Oracle AI Data Platform Workbench

tutorials.title: How to create an instance of AIDP Workbench

tutorials.title: How to Set Up Identity and Access Management (IAM) Policies for AIDP Workbench
tutorials.description: This sprint teaches you how to configure Identity and Access Management (IAM) policies to securely manage your Oracle AI Data Platform (AIDP) Workbench instance
